amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 as en bloc: Nos. 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 17, 18, 21, 23, and 33.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleischmann amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Fleischmann.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleischmann amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleischmann amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
